edu.cmu.commons.indri.api
Interface QueryEnvironment

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
QueryEnvironment
public interface QueryEnvironment
extends Remote

A Remote interface for selected entry points on Indri JNI's QueryEnvironment class. These methods rely on Serializable alternatives to Indri JNI's data structures.

runQuery

QueryResult runQuery(QueryRequest request)
                     throws Exception
Parameters:
request - a QueryRequest containing all search parameters.
Returns:
a QueryResult containing all search results.
Throws:
Exception

runQuery

ScoredExtent[] runQuery(String queryString,
                        int numResults)
                        throws Exception
Returns scores on extents instead of documents.

Parameters:
queryString - an Indri query string.
numResults - number of scored extents to return.
Returns:
an array of scored extent objects.
Throws:
Exception

runQuery

ScoredExtent[] runQuery(String queryString,
                        int[] documentIds,
                        int numResults)
                        throws Exception
Returns scores on extents within a specific set of documents.

Parameters:
queryString - an Indri query string.
documentIds - an array of integer document identifiers.
numResults - number of scored extents to return.
Returns:
an array of scored extent objects.
Throws:
Exception

documentMetadata

String[] documentMetadata(int[] documentIds,
                          String attributeName)
                          throws Exception
Parameters:
documentIds - an array of document identifiers.
attributeName - a metadata attribute name.
Returns:
an array of attribute values for attributeName, one for each input document.
Throws:
Exception

documentIDsFromMetadata

int[] documentIDsFromMetadata(String attributeName,
                              String[] attributeValues)
                              throws Exception
Parameters:
attributeName - a metadata attribute name.
attributeValues - an array of values associated with attributeName.
Returns:
an array of document IDs where the document has a metadata key that matches attributeName, with a value matching one of the attributeValues.
Throws:
Exception

                       throws Exception
Parameters:

Returns:

Exception

expressionCount

                       String expressionType)
                       throws Exception
Parameters:
expression - a valid Indri query.
expressionType - unknown-- not specified by Indri JNI.
